body_html:
It seems that this crash or OOM issue happen after program write .ckpt file and start the following training steps.

the error is after line : INFO:tensorflow:global_step/sec: 0.648611, which program just output .ckpt and start the following training steps again. But why previous loop (output *.ckpt file and continue training ) has no issue?

the error is after line : INFO:tensorflow:global_step/sec: 0.648611, which program  just output .ckpt and start the following training steps again. But why previous loop (output *.ckpt file and continue training ) has no issue?

body:
It seems that this crash or OOM issue happen after program write .ckpt file and start the following training steps.

the error is after line : **INFO:tensorflow:global_step/sec: 0.648611**, which program  just output .ckpt and start the following training steps again. But why previous loop (output *.ckpt file and continue training ) has no issue?
